text: Au dela e donu bolo Au go Yihowah, go di God mouli o digau Israel, Au e hagamodu bolo digau Moab mo Ammon la ga haga mooho gi daha be Sodom mo Gomorrah.2.9 Genesis 19.24 Nadau gowaa gaa hai nia gowaa toolo, ga mooho gaa hana hua beelaa gi muli, gaa tomo nia geinga tolo. Agu daangada ala e mouli hua igolo i di madagoaa deelaa gaa hai digaula hagahuaidu, ga kae nadau henua.”
